attributes.additional_details: No one is white skinned in colour. This inaccurate description was only introduced as a means of identifying with purity and superiority. Beige is a more accurate description of the lighter skin tone and includes no racist undertones or connotations.
attributes.background: I want a more accurate description of the lighter human skin tone made available on application form questions around ethnicity.

rejection.details: The Government is not responsible for determining how ethnic minorities are referred to.
